argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lcdneg.h | |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) |
| 2 |  | lcdneg.u | |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lcdneg.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) |
| 4 |  | lcdneg.m | |- M = ( invg ` R ) |
| 5 |  | lcdneg.c | |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) |
| 6 |  | lcdneg.s | |- S = ( Scalar ` C ) |
| 7 |  | lcdneg.n | |- N = ( invg ` S ) |
| 8 |  | lcdneg.k | |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( oppR ` R ) = ( oppR ` R ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3, 9, 5, 6, 8 | #P_lcdsca | |- ( ph -> S = ( oppR ` R ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( invg ` S ) = ( invg ` ( oppR ` R ) ) ) |
| 12 | 9, 4 | #P_opprneg | |- M = ( invg ` ( oppR ` R ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 7, 12 | #P_3eqtr4g | |- ( ph -> N = M ) |
